search.query: index="logiq" host=$hosttok|s$ sourcetype="DIAG05" Event.System.Level<=$toklevel$|rename Event.System.Provider{@Name} AS Provider|stats count by Provider|eval _lp=lower(Provider)|sort _lp

index="logiq" host=$hosttok|s$ sourcetype="DIAG05"|rename Event.System.Computer AS Computer, Event.System.Provider{@Name} AS Provider, Event.System.Level AS Level, Event.EventData.Data AS DataValues, Event.EventData.Data{@Name} AS DataNames|search Level<=$toklevel$ Provider=$tokprovider|s$|spath input=DataValues output=EventData path=string|eval EventData=if(isnull(EventData),mvzip(DataNames,DataValues,"="),EventData)|table _time,Computer,Provider,Level,EventData
